name: Dullahan
description: A large, headless fey creature with a severed head that instills fear and dread.
memorable: Its ability to instantly drop foes to 0 hp if deemed 'doomed' makes it a terrifying adversary.
goals: To instill fear, hunt down and eliminate doomed targets.
relations: May be in league with other fey or serve darker powers.
environment: Typically found in eerie or cursed places within the fey realm.
strengths: High durability with impressive physical attributes and multiple attacks per turn.
weaknesses: Limited social capabilities due to average intelligence and charisma.
attacks: Multiattack with Spine Whip, dealing slashing and necrotic damage; Necrotic Bolt as a ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Seal the Doom, which can instantly drop doomed creatures to 0 hit points.
senses: Truesight to detect creatures within 60 feet.
skills: Expert in Intimidation and Persuasion, capable of instilling fear and manipulation.
additional_information: Does not require food, drink, or sleep.
Able to move through difficult terrain without penalty.
Can frighten foes with its Baleful Glare.
test_queries: headless monster of the fey realm
large creature with a severed head
dread inducing fey with necrotic abilities
fearsome fey that doesn't require rest
monster that instantly drops doomed foes
